## Cisco-IOS-XR-um-spanning-tree-cfg.yang

- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)

### Description

Major update of the UM model to closely match the XR CLI and to support the OC requirements mapping onto this model.

## XPaths Modified
